short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple One Page Note extension with cloud syncing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a single-page note-taking application created by AI. It can help you synchronize notes that are recorded on the go across various devices.
这是一个由AI创建的单页笔记应用。可帮您在各种设备间同步随手记录的笔记。
